Comments: <Vijay> These are the meta data associated to the file.  I see this as a crucial for enterprise document management, search & archival strategy. We should identify the equivallent in ODF and translate the metadata of the file to ODF

All these basically only change the way you will see the document in the editing environmnet - this is not formatting applied to the text in the document, nor the page settings - its what toolbars are accessible and how big/small the doc looks and whether its in print layout or web layout etc
My assumption is that we can leave out all these for conversion scenario (at least for now) - would like to know what people think
